text:
ElasticSearch Expert | Cambridge, MA | REMOTE OKAY |Contract/Part-time

I'm looking for like-minded independent consultants available to collaborate with me on quality projects. I have relationships with federally funded research and development labs, and medical research academic and non-profit laboratories.

I have a current need for someone who is an Elasticsearch expert for a project with a non-profit laboratory in Cambridge, MA. If you value your independence and desire flexibility and have extra bandwidth, let’s talk. Send me a resume and the time you’ll have available. (amy.kobi@springbok.io)
